dialogue_lines.speaker: Police
dialogue_lines.text: Sir, may report po kami tungkol sa drug bust operation sa Barangay San Jose.

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: Ah oo, yung operation natin kahapon. Maganda ang resulta. May nahuli tayong 3 suspects.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Police
dialogue_lines.text: Opo sir, pero may mga inconsistencies sa report. Baka kailangan nating i-review yung radio logs.

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: Sige, i-review natin yung radio logs para sa proper documentation. Dapat accurate ang lahat ng reports.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Good morning po, Sir PO1 Darwin. May mga tanong po kami tungkol kay Leo Mendoza.

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: Ah, kayo pala yung mga nag-iinvestigate. Si Leo ay mabuting pulis. May proper authorization ba kayo?

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: Pwede mo bang i-continue yung report mo sa ibang lugar? May visitors ako.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Police
dialogue_lines.text: Opo sir, sige po. I-continue ko na lang sa desk ko.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Pwede po ba naming makita yung radio communication logs? Baka may makita kami doon na related sa nangyari kay Leo.

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: Radio logs? Bakit ninyo kailangan yun? Hindi kayo authorized na mag-access ng police records.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Para sa defense ng aming client po.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Under Section 1, Rule 115 ng Rules of Court, may karapatan kaming mag-investigate at mag-access ng evidence para sa legal case.

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: Hindi ninyo pwedeng gawin yan nang walang proper authorization. Kailangan ninyong mag-request sa higher authorities.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Sir, under Article III, Section 7 ng 1987 Constitution at Republic Act No. 6713, may karapatan kaming mag-access ng public records para sa legal proceedings.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Ito ay part ng due process.

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: Sige, pero wala kayong makikita doon.

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: Normal lang ang lahat ng radio communications namin. Eto yung logs.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Salamat po, Sir. Titingnan lang namin para sa legal documentation.

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: Lahat ng entries ay proper at documented. Si Leo ay mabuting pulis.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Salamat po, Sir. Para lang sa legal requirements namin.

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: Sige, pero remember - hindi kayo pwedeng mag-copy o mag-take ng photos.

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: Viewing lang.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Opo, Sir. Viewing lang po. Salamat sa cooperation.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: "Ayos. Nakuha namin yung radio logs."

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Miguel, may nakita tayong evidence.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Radio Communication Log at may gaps sa communication. May tinatago siya.

dialogue_lines.speaker: PO1 Darwin
dialogue_lines.text: "Wala naman silang makikita doon. Normal lang ang lahat ng entries. Hindi nila alam na may mga missing entries."

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Oo, obvious na may tinatago si PO1 Darwin.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Pero hindi natin pwedeng i-confront siya dito. Kailangan nating mag-gather ng more evidence.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Tama. Under Rule 130 ng Rules of Court, kailangan nating i-establish yung chain of custody ng evidence. Kailangan nating i-preserve yung integrity ng lahat ng evidence.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Siguro pwede tayong mag-check sa morgue para sa autopsy report. Under Republic Act No. 6713, may karapatan tayong mag-access ng public records para sa legal proceedings.
